name: TailwindCss Cheatsheet
description: TailwindCss is gaining popularity among masses. I too tried along with many other developers to learn tailwind. In my quest I realized there is a void for a cheatsheet. There were some other cheatsheet but it never gave me a bird's eye view nor any satisfaction. Hence I made this and have been appreaciated by developers globally.

name: TechNotes
description: Keeping everything in Mind is not a great idea. It's way better to write it down as simply & precisely. What's better than Markdown to take notes and empty my Mind for other new & important things in Web Development.
